pitch.cc: David Price has thrown 91 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 94 over the past 10 pitches.
Dangerous count for David Price; Derek Jeter is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .758 OPS against them this season and .707 against everything else.
